articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The United States, France and several allies called for an immediate 21-day ceasefire following intense discussions at the United Nations.
articles.title: Lebanese prime minister believes ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah possible

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israeli forces battled Hamas-led militants in the northern and southern Gaza Strip on Thursday, and Palestinian health officials said Israeli military strikes across the enclave had killed at least 17 Palestinians overnight.
articles.title: Fighting rages as some Gazans voice hope at renewed ceasefire calls

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A Hong Kong judge on Thursday sentenced to jail two former editors who had been earlier found guilty of sedition in a landmark case that sparked an international outcry.
articles.title: Hong Kong court sentences two editors to jail in landmark sedition case

articles.author: Steve Holland, Patricia Zengerle
articles.description: The aid includes the first shipment of a precision-guided glide bomb called the Joint Standoff Weapon, with a range of up to 81 miles, giving Ukraine a major upgrade.
articles.title: Biden announces $8 billion in military aid for Ukraine

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Kremlin said on Thursday that changes to Russia's nuclear weapons doctrine outlined by President Vladimir Putin should be considered a signal to Western countries that there will be consequences if they participate in attacks on Russia.
articles.title: Kremlin says changes to Russia's nuclear policy are a signal to the West

articles.author: Rich McKay, Brendan O'Brien, Andrew Hay
articles.description: Florida braced for the arrival of Hurricane Helene on Thursday, forecast to be a powerful Category 4 storm when it smashes into the state's panhandle.
articles.title: Hurricane Helene barrels toward Florida with fierce winds, storm surge

articles.author: Ben Blanchard, Yimou Lee
articles.description: Taiwan's defence ministry raised the alarm on Thursday about a renewed surge of Chinese military activity around the island and live fire drills, accusing Beijing of policy instability that presented a serious challenge to its neighbours.
articles.title: Taiwan raises alarm about renewed military threats from 'unstable' China

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Russia unleashed an overnight drone strike on the Ukrainian capital Kyiv on Thursday, causing damage to civilian infrastructure, city officials said.
articles.title: Russia launches overnight drone strike on Kyiv

articles.author: Muvija M
articles.description: Elon Musk hit back at Britain on Thursday after reports that he had not been invited to the country's upcoming investment summit, alleging the government was releasing convicted paedophiles while imprisoning people over social media posts.
articles.title: Elon Musk hits out at Britain after reported summit snub

articles.author: Jack Queen, Luc Cohen
articles.description: Donald Trump's lawyers on Thursday will seek to persuade a New York state appeals court to toss a nearly half-billion dollar judgment against the former U.S. president over real estate business practices a court has declared fraudulent.
articles.title: Trump to ask New York appeals court to toss nearly $500 mln civil fraud judgment
